entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: Add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out #105580
  • NET8 : Application doesn't work anymore after NET7->NET8 migration and is stuck with excessive CPU usage. #105576
  • Bug Report: Authentication Validation Error (GenericFailure) in .NET8 #105574
  • Arm64/Sve: GatherVectorWithByteOffsets fails for JitStressRegs #105568
  • [mono] Remove depracated LLVM JIT from the Mono codebase #105566
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_LCL_ADDR) && lvaGetDesc(node->AsLclVarCommon())->IsHiddenBufferStructArg()' during 'Morph - Global' #105565
    9.0.0
  • Do I need to use IHostApplicationLifetime in timed background service #105564
  • HTTP/SSL stress Linux builds broken by PGO update #105560
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Another potential bad codegen with shift by `Vector128` #105558
    9.0.0
  • EventListenerThreadPool test failing in nativeaot outerloop runs #105556
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Unnecessarily large copies to resolve parameter/argument conflicts for tailcalls #105552
    10.0.0
  • HttpRequestException Lacks StatusCode Information on ProxyTunnelError #105546
  • [mono] Vector shuffle failures in Mono LLVM scenario #105537
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.JsonElementTests.DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException #105532
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty failure in CI #105526

Closed

  • dotnet-pgo is not found in NuGet feeds #102257
    9.0.0
  • Inliner improvements in .NET 9.0 #93069
    9.0.0
  • Assert in CounterGroup.OnEventSourceCommand after trying to run BDN x86 #99497
    9.0.0
  • How to debug code that is being compiled in layers? I have the following problem #94964
    9.0.0
  • Convert to GeneratedComInterface fixall will put StringMarshalling on all interfaces if the first interface needs it #94376
    9.0.0
  • x86 Interop Call stack incorrect when stopped in native exception filter #105116
    9.0.0
  • Self-contained C++/CLI #897
  • [mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #101495
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 16 Regressions on 3/14/2024 6:24:18 PM #100085
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: executionAborted in `GcInfoDecoder::EnumerateLiveSlots` #102370
    9.0.0
  • [6.0/8.0] Failure in BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11: no exception thrown #104390
    6.0.x
  • [NETSDKE2E]Native symbols cannot be resolved with PerfView tool. #105457
  • Trying to load CustomModifiers for runtime field hits an assert #97116
    9.0.0
  • Function worker's service provider resolves scoped service from the root as singleton #97091
    9.0.0
  • `HostResolverFactory.ResolveServiceProviderFactory` generates environment with incorrect `IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName` #96596
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions from "Remove BBJ_NONE" #95646
    9.0.0
  • Base64 String decoding #50233
    Future
  • MaxWorkingSet has wrong value when setting container memory limit #81372
    9.0.0
  • Emulated x86 and x64 .NET 8 on AARCH64 can't restore project #97228
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. #100475
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester #100495
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/15/2024 7:33:56 PM #99964
    9.0.0
  • asmdiff failed for checked and release for smoke_tests.nativeaot.windows.arm64 #104584
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Spurious 0-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot.windows.arm64 #104441
    9.0.0
  • Do not use coreclr.{dll/so/dylib} name for Mono runtime #34202
    9.0.0
  • Remove old author name, email and copyright comments in Corelib c# files #38712
    Future
  • [Mono][TE] Optimize thread related functions #55339
    Future
  • [Mono][Codespace] Add mono desktop build optioins #75647
    Future
  • [Perf] Regression in GetField #63743
    9.0.0
  • Getting Enum fields/attributes in trimmed and AOT'd applications #105506
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Encoding.Tests failed in CI on Mono x64 Linux with SIGSEGV in reflection code #45254
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] FieldInfo.SetValue does not do an init check for readonly static fields #37903
    Future
  • [mono] Full support for System.Reflection.Emit #37794
    9.0.0
  • Update Mono version to .NET6 for TE official run #61816
    9.0.0
  • The JIT compiler encountered invalid IL code or an internal limitation. #105518
    9.0.0
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime #103178
  • JIT: Arm64 release JitDisasm has a lot of empty comments #91719
    9.0.0
  • Building tests fails on a system without support for RSA+SHA1 #105486
  • Blazor WebAssembly: "An unhandled error has occurred. Reload" since .NET 8.0.5 #102307
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Incorrect boot.json for extensions #105393
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Issue when defining assets for localized assemblies #105399
    9.0.0
  • Problem with shuffle thunks tracking in collectible AssemblyLoaderAllocator #55697
    9.0.0
  • Excessive exceptions generated in StackTraceSymbols when using Portable PDB #98506
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters/runtimecounters.cmd #105443
  • JIT: SVE Assertion failed 'GetEmitter()->emitInsIsStore(ins)' during 'Generate code' #105478
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] Remaining AOT Linux x86-64 perf issues after RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #83330
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Vector256` shift by `Vector128` #105465
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen for bit extractions #105466
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `AlignRight` #105468
    9.0.0
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Could not execute the method because either the method itself or the containing type is not fully instantiated. #103891
    9.0.0
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.FormattedObject.BasicObjectTests.BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch failure #104905
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 11/9/2023 1:06:12 AM #94717
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update Preview/Experimental Attributes in Intrinsics #105579
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 9.0.0
  • Fix shutdown with multiple unhandled HW exceptions #105578
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update suppression reason for Assembly.GetType call #105577
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • JIT: Fix ShiftRightLogical constant folding #105571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs`/`operator-` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #105569
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars" #105562
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105554
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update Alpine version for libraries pipeline #105553
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reset counters within Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [WIP] DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] disable implicit null checks #105544
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure s_defaultTimeoutTicks is set with the same lock. #105542
    area-System.Transactions
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't create a constant node for Vector64 #105538
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [cdac] Add GetArrayData to Object contract, partially implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData #105534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Console.Write{Line} span overloads #105531
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Determine which ARM64 HWIntrinsics will throw ArgumentOufOfRangeExceptions #105527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add alternate system color experimental feature #105525
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • [release/9.0-preview7] JIT: Fix placement of `GT_START_NOGC` for tailcalls in face of bulk copy with write barrier calls #105572
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SOS !dumpmt -md command #105575
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [EventSource] Block EventCommandExecuted callback during initialization #105341
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Only apply StringMarshalling to GeneratedComInterface in fixer when needed even in fix-all #105573
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, code-fixer
  • Correctly identify when an unmanaged exception hijack is occurring and display unmanaged frames in callstack #105536
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames from `GetNumVirtuals*` APIs #105365
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disable failing test on issue #105557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix placement of `GT_START_NOGC` for tailcalls in face of bulk copy with write barrier calls #105551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplify platform attribute for AesGcm and ChaCha20Poly1305 #105547
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Fix throwing exception when calling RunClassConstructor on a generic type with a static constructor #105535
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Base 64 decoder, reject input when unused bits are not 0 #105262
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Simplify initialization of RuntimeMetrics #105539
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • New feature switches that are not going to be publicly documented #105496
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Revert "Optimize BOX+UNBOX for "T? -> T" and "T -> T?" (#104931)" #105515
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip reloc handling for IMAGE_REL_BASED_DIR64 if already handled #105522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Disable JIT/Directed/PrimitiveABI on apple mobile due to missing native library #105563
    disabled-test, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Disable broken `linux_musl` Mono AOT cross-compiler jobs in .NET 8 #105549
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.9
  • Disable ImportWithPasswordOrFileName_IterationCountLimitExceeded on 32-bit CPUs #105455
    area-System.Security
  • Support field access on variables of type Enum #105524
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use shared EightObjects InlineArray #105540
    area-Meta
  • Spill side effects before impStoreNullableFields #105529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing frame on inner exception stack trace in release build #105482
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Release: Do not have empty comments #105528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.9
  • [browser] Fix computing destination sub path and publish extension target path in Wasm SDK #105458
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix ShuffleThunk cache heap #105480
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up some usages of LowLevelList<T> #105407
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue 98506 - Excessive exceptions generated in StackTraceSymbols #105530
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary in runtimecounters test #105520
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Ensure constant evaluation of shifts on xarch broadcast the operand to the correct size #105487
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure we don't reuse temps when calling fgMorphArgs on LIR nodes #105508
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Add FFR register liveness tracking #105348
    arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Fix throwing exception when calling RunClassConstructor on a generic type with a static constructor #105513
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Delete outdated comments #105519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Updated

  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #105456
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use filesystem name mapping on FreeBSD #105417
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2503444 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Generate type generic composition information as constructed #105133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests.c… #105502
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Methodical_[r,d][o,1] on x64 AOT and fullAOT #105453
    NO-MERGE, arch-x64, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Only ship runtime packs that are classified as mobile targets #104307
    area-Build-mono
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update runtime metrics tests to avoid failures on some platforms #105300
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Enable CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates on Alpine #105489
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places #105380
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
